job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Job Description:<br>a) Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or Electrical Engineering (with a Software emphasis)<br>b) 5-8 years’ experience specifically in the Flight Simulation industry<br>c) Recent experience with Linux OS<br>d) Recent experience programming in C or C++<br>e) Experience with systems engineering processes, to include requirements analysis, system architecture definition and design, and system verification testing <br><br>*Note: No C2C & No Sponsorship available for this role.
